channel.title: Yet another compiler problem
channel.description:
My compiler...
@echo off COLOR 09 title DePredaTe's Compiler. echo Server should be done in a few seconds, please wait. "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_05\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause
My error...
Server should be done in a few seconds, please wait. javac: file not found: *.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options Press any key to continue . . .
Path is correct i edited it personaly to my java JDK files. How do i fix this?

item.title: Yet another compiler problem

@Schedin wrote:

k ill try ty
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 09, 2008, 12:17:09 AM[/size][hr]didnt work same error, any other advice?

item.title: Yet another compiler problem
item.dc:creator: @Schedin Schedin
item.description:
@Schedin wrote:

My compiler…

@echo off
COLOR 09
title DePredaTe’s Compiler.
echo Server should be done in a few seconds, please wait.
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_05\bin\javac.exe” *.java
pause

My error…

Server should be done in a few seconds, please wait.
javac: file not found: *.java
Usage: javac
use -help for a list of possible options
Press any key to continue . . .

Path is correct i edited it personaly to my java JDK files. How do i fix this?
